unnormalised: A local vada pav stall owner in Mumbai, affectionately known as "Anna," has reportedly filed a complaint against "GlobalTech Solutions Pvt. Ltd." for causing a major traffic jam near his stall at 27, Juhu Galli, Andheri West, Mumbai, 400058. According to Anna, the company's new office opening at Plot No. C-54/55, Bandra-Kurla Complex (BKC), Mumbai, 400051, has led to "unprecedented levels of car chaos," directly impacting his daily business. He jokingly claims that his average daily earnings have dropped by a staggering Rs. 2000, forcing him to consider "diversifying into healthy salads."
normalised: A local vada pav stall owner in Mumbai, affectionately known as Anna, has reportedly filed a complaint against GlobalTech Solutions Private Limited for causing a major traffic jam near his stall at twenty seven, Juhu Galli, Andheri West, Mumbai, four hundred thousand and fifty eight. According to Anna, the company's new office opening at Plot Number C fifty four slash fifty five, Bandra-Kurla Complex (B-K-C), Mumbai, four hundred thousand and fifty one, has led to unprecedented levels of car chaos, directly impacting his daily business. He jokingly claims that his average daily earnings have dropped by a staggering rupee two thousand, forcing him to consider diversifying into healthy salads.

unnormalised: "It's utter pandemonium!" exclaimed Anna, gesturing wildly with a spatula. "Before, people used to park easily and enjoy my vada pav. Now, they're stuck in traffic for hours, probably dreaming of a desk job at GlobalTech! They might as well set up a branch office right *here* in my stall! At least I'd be closer to getting a corner office near the restroom. Maybe suite no. 28/B, behind the potato bhajias, ground floor!"
normalised: It's utter pandemonium! exclaimed Anna, gesturing wildly with a spatula. Before, people used to park easily and enjoy my vada pav. Now, they're stuck in traffic for hours, probably dreaming of a desk job at GlobalTech! They might as well set up a branch office right here in my stall! At least I'd be closer to getting a corner office near the restroom. Maybe suite number twenty eight slash B, behind the potato bhajias, ground floor!

unnormalised: The police are reportedly investigating the matter, although sources say they're primarily focused on securing a free vada pav from Anna before making any formal statements. GlobalTech Solutions Pvt. Ltd. has yet to comment, but rumors abound that they're considering adding "Vada Pav Fridays" to their employee benefits package, located in sector 12/A, pantry area, 4th floor. Perhaps a new business opportunity for Anna is on the horizon, located in the BKC branch.
